page.title: 07POULTRY FARMING
page.content: Poultry farming is a very big and important industry,because we eat a lot of eggs and chicken. There are several types of poultry farming,for example:egg production,chicken meat production, turkey production,duck production, quail production and other less common forms. Chickens lay eggs to be eaten or to be incubated in hatcheries.The chicks from hatcheries are reared to produce more eggs or chicken meat to be eaten. These baby chicks are taken to farms in specially heated vans and placed in clean,warm,dry and light cabins with plenty of food and water. Some are reared on the floor with shavings for bedding,others are reared in cages for egg production.They stay in the cabins for seven weeks then are taken by wagon to places to be killed.
